title: New: Amber Run – Thank You
content:
Huge, unadulterated stadium-pop has been filling my speakers a lot recently.

From blog favourites Osca to Brooklynite’s PROM, the sound of massive vocal lines and emotive melody have been seriously capturing my attention. Nottingham’s Amber Run are no exception and new track Thank You is a perfect example of their piano led pop of Coldplay proportions. Opening intimately with restrained vocals and piano chords, the track builds into something special that will surely garner them some serious attention.

Stream the track below and catch their new E.P Pilot which was released on September 21st via RCA Victor.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
